trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref> interface to create a message that responds to a call to instantiate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"> </xref> grensesnittet for å opprette en melding som svarer til et kall til å starte et eksternt objekt.

trans-unit.source: A ConstructionResponse object returns the result of a construction request sent with the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for ConstructionResponse returnerer resultatet av en konstruksjon forespørsel sendt med den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: The ConstructionResponse class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ConstructionResponse brukes av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an instance of the ConstructionResponse class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å opprette en forekomst av klassen ConstructionResponse direkte. Bruk i stedet den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"></xref> class from an array of remoting headers and a request message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"> </xref> klassen fra en matrise av ekstern kommunikasjon topp- og en forespørselsmelding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse>klassen brukes av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å opprette en forekomst av den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse>klasse direkte; bruk i stedet den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse>

trans-unit.source: An array of remoting headers that contain key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av ekstern kommunikasjon overskrifter som inneholder nøkkel / verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"></xref> fields for those headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
trans-unit.target: Denne matrisen brukes til å initialisere <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"> </xref> felt for hodene som hører til i navneområdet "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".

trans-unit.source: A request message that constitutes a constructor call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: En forespørselsmelding som utgjør en konstruktør kalle på et eksternt objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>grensesnitt som representerer en samling av ekstern kommunikasjon meldingsegenskaper.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The Properties property returns the value of the inherited <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties> field.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Properties returnerer verdien for arvet <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties>felt.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>grensesnitt som representerer en samling av ekstern kommunikasjon meldingsegenskaper.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
